info.author: Philip J Grabner, Canary Health Inc
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Application Frameworks
info.description:
==============
Pyramid Forums
==============

.. IMPORTANT::

  This package is currently in the "planning" stage. In short, nothing
  to download yet.

The `pyramid_forums` package will provide a generic system to create:

* discussion forums
* bulletin boards
* customer support

With support of integrations to external content/support systems such
as Zendesk.


Project
=======

* Homepage: https://github.com/canaryhealth/pyramid_forums
* Bugs: https://github.com/canaryhealth/pyramid_forums/issues
info.keywords: web wsgi pyramid tween forum discussion bulletin board customer support collaborative content
info.name: pyramid_forums
info.summary: A discussion forums/bulletin board/customer support collaborative content system

Important

This package is currently in the “planning” stage. In short, nothing to download yet.

The pyramid_forums package will provide a generic system to create:

  • discussion forums
  • bulletin boards
  • customer support

With support of integrations to external content/support systems such as Zendesk.
